-- This file is generated from NestedMachine.ump --


MODULE Sm_Handle  
    
  VAR 
    state : { s1 , s2 , s2a , s2b }; 
    event : { e1 , e2 , e3 };        
  
MODULE Sm  
    
  VAR 
    handle : Sm_Handle;     
  ASSIGN
    init(handle.state) := s1;    
  TRANS
    ( (handle.state = s1) -> (
      (handle.event = e1 & next(handle.state) = s2)  |
      (handle.event = e2 & next(handle.state) = s2b)  ) ) &
    ( (handle.state = s2) -> (
       handle.event = e1 & next(handle.state) = s1) )  
      
MODULE S2( handle )  
        
  TRANS
    ( (handle.state = s2a) -> (
       handle.event = e3 & next(handle.state) = s2b) ) &
    ( (handle.state = s2b) -> (
       handle.event = e3 & next(handle.state) = s2a) )
